name: Viruses vs Environment; Causes & Effects
content: International Society of Environmental Relationship and Sustainability (ISERS) is one of the Non-profitable professional association meant for research and development in the field of Environmental Sustainability and Climate Change. ISERS is a paramount body which has brought technical revolution and sustainable development on environmental planning, research and management. International Society of Environmental Relationship and Sustainability (ISERS) is organizing a free webinar on “Viruses vs Environment; Causes & Effects.” on 29th August,2020 at 12.30 PM to 02.00 PM.
